level_1.skillDescription:
A lightning elemental attack that hits straight ahead
Fires 3 lightning strikes that pierce enemies

level_2.skillDescription:
Adds the ability to charge to 2nd stage
Charging to higher stages increases the number of lightning strikes

level_3.skillDescription:
Adds the ability to charge to 3rd stage
Charging to higher stages increases the number of lightning strikes

abilities.skillDescription: Increases EP consumption and skill power
